name: DONKEY.SMS
description:
This is a homebrew game for Master System consoles inspired by the game DONKEY.BAS that shipped with MS-DOS back in 1981! 

This game was remade a few times for various platforms (DONKEY.NET, DONKEY.APP...) and languages (DonkeyPy), but never for Master System!

DONKEY.SMS is more fun and more challenging than the original, not to mention more colourful! Difficulty (speed) progressively increases, best scores are saved, and there are two new game modes to unlock!

DONKEY.SMS plays very well using a gamepad, but a paddle is the controller of choice.

Also available as a cartridge from the raphnet store. See the project page for more information about this game.
